other_tests.findings: Normal results in both legs and left leg lumbosacral paraspinal muscles
Vocal folds had full range of motion during vegetative tasks; during phonation, vocal folds were held immobile.
Pronounced problems with coordination in oral cavity and bolus preparation; pharyngeal and laryngeal motions during swallow intact.

other_tests.procedure_name: Genetic Testing for PARK8 and PARK2
other_tests.date: One year after onset of anarthria
other_tests.findings: Negative results for PARK8; one silent mutation in a coding region and various SNPs for PARK2.
Presence of a known mutation G829A was established.
Marked improvement in speech after injection.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Continued benefit noted with several injections at intervals of 4 to 6 months.
